updated_cases.title: Verify that changes to bypass policy are read by proxy on the fly
updated_cases.custom_summary: Verify that changes to bypass policy are read by proxy on the fly
updated_cases.custom_preconds: Enable proper logs and ensure proper client is installed
updated_cases.custom_steps: 1. Configure the system with proper build and policies Send the traffic specified and verify for bypass functionality Check for events in appropriate cases
updated_cases.custom_expected: 1. 1. Functionality should be handled properly and proper events/logs should be generated whenever applicable 2. No errors or crashes should be seen
